Function Documentation

void cvl_init ( void   ) 

Initializes CVL, using the currently active OpenGL context.
After calling this function, the application can use cvl_error() and cvl_error_msg() to query the CVL error status.
Initialization includes correct setup of all OpenGL extensions (via GLEW).

void cvl_deinit ( void   ) 

Deinitializes CVL and frees all allocated ressources.

const char* cvl_check_version ( const char *  req_version  ) 

Parameters:
req_version The required version.
Check that the version of the library is at minimum the requested one and return the version string; return NULL if the condition is not satisfied. If a NULL is passed to this function, no check is done, but the version string is simply returned.
